member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.AsyncState.IAsyncState.TryGet(Microsoft.Extensions.AsyncState.AsyncStateToken,System.Object@)
member.summary: Tries to get the stored async context from the state.
member.param: The token representing the state to extract.
Receives the value associated with the specified token, if the context is initialized; otherwise, the default value for the type of the parameter.
member.returns: if the context is initialized; otherwise, .
